rewardValue.referenceValue: Spends on choice of any two packs

applicableMerchantsOrDomains: Grocery Category – Blinkit & Reliance Smart Bazaar

rewards.rewardDescription: 5% Cashback on choice of any two packs. Maximum 500 points per month.

applicableMerchantsOrDomains: SmartBuy Platform (IGP, Flights, Hotels, Bus, Rail, Instant Vouchers, Apple Imagine Tresor)

rewards.rewardDescription: 5% Cashback on SmartBuy Platform. Maximum 500 points per month. Valid on Successful Transactions completed on SmartBuy under categories IGP, Flights, Hotels, Bus, Rail, Instant Vouchers, Apple Imagine Tresor only.

rewardValue.referenceValue: Spends on choice of any one e-commerce platform

rewards.rewardDescription: 3% Cashback on choice of any one e-commerce platform. Maximum 500 points per month.

rewardValue.referenceValue: All UPI spends on RuPay credit card

applicableMerchantsOrDomains: UPI spends on RuPay credit card

rewards.rewardDescription: 1% Cashback on all UPI spends on RuPay credit card. Maximum 500 points per month. Applicable only for PIXEL RuPay Credit card holders.

excludedMerchantsOrDomains: Purchases converted to EMI post facto
Payment of card fees and other charges

rewards.rewardDescription: 1% Unlimited Cashback on all other spends, excluding Fuel Spends, Wallet Spends, Rent payments, Government related transactions, EMI Transactions, Purchases converted to EMI post facto, Cash Advances, Payment of Outstanding Balances, Payment of card fees and other charges.
1% Fuel Surcharge waiver on fuel transactions. Minimum transaction of ₹400, Maximum transaction of ₹5,000 & Maximum waiver of ₹250 per statement cycle.

rewardValue.referenceValue: HDFC Bank credit card payments via Dineout Pay

rewards.rewardDescription: Save up to 20% on HDFC Bank credit card payments via Dineout Pay. Maximum of ₹300 per month. Offer valid till 31st December 2024.
